```{r}
#| label: gene-metabolites
#| echo: false
#| message: false

make_metabolite_table(input = list(type = "gene", content = "ROCK2"))  %>% #params$type, content = params$content))
  gt::gt() %>% 
  gt::cols_hide(columns = c("gene_name", "gene_accession")) %>% 
  gt::cols_label(
    metabolite_name = "Metabolite", 
    metabolite_accession = "HMDB Accession"
  ) %>% 
  gt::tab_options(table.width = gt::pct(100))
```
This metabolite table shows metabolites known to associate with `r params$content`.
